name: Microwave Oven Panasonic NN-ST32MMZPE Silver
origAbout: Become a home chef in minutes - The Panasonic Solo Microwave Oven comes power-packed with intelligent features that add convenience to daily cooking. Vapor Clean - keep your oven clean, odour-free and stain free with the touch of a button. Re-Heat - auto reheat feature enables quick and even reheating of food at the touch of a button. Quick and even defrosting thaws food without compromising on flavour and texture. The auto cook menu gives you access to a host of recipes ranging from starters and main course to snacks and desserts. make every day meal a gourmet delight.
